events.name: validation
events.wd_description: The proposed model is validated using expert knowledge and data from a large manufacturer of EV lithium-ion batteries, employing a simulation algorithm for data generation.

events.name: ion Technology case study
events.wd_description: Expert knowledge and data from Lition Technology are used to validate the proposed model, despite security and data availability constraints.

events.name: ulation process
events.wd_description: A simulation process generates data based on real-world approximations to validate the model.

events.name: Minimizing CO2 emissions
events.description: The bi-objective mixed-integer linear programming model aims to minimize total costs and CO2 emissions.
